mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IF_FTD_001 ( ESB_SEQ ,VARIABLE ,BREAKDOWN ,BREAKDOWN_CATEGORY ,YYEAR ,RD_VALUE ,STATUS ,FOOTNOTES ,UNIT_FOR_TSM_AND_CSV ,ESB_INTERFACE_ID ,ESB_STATUS_CD ,ESB_TRANSACTION_ID ,ESB_RECV_DT) values ( SEQ_IF_FTD_001.NEXTVAL , #{Variable ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Breakdown ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Breakdown_category ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Year ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RD_Value ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Status ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Footnotes ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Unit_for_TSM_and_CSV ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interfaceId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'N', #{transactionId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverMsgRecvDt ,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
